name: Interregnum-Alpha
description:
Story :
Long time ago,
A far kingdom loses a battle and the kingdom becomes weak.Rebellions begin all over the country.Khant ,an ordinary peasant, finds himself in the midst of chaos.
He need fight against rebels and enemy troops until chaos stops.

World :
There is no finished story in this game.The period in which the character lives is more important.Chaos, destruction, death...
The main goal in the game is to bring peace to these sinister lands.

Gameplay :
We tried to design maps according to some game styles.
Depending on your style of play: you can play fast or slow, melee or remote attack.There are places we want you to explore on maps.You can earn lots of equipment from these areas.Feel free to look around.

DLC's :
In the following period: paid and free content will be added.
